thread.title: Fergie wears over-sized shearling aviator jacket in Milan
thread.title_full: Fergie wears over-sized shearling aviator jacket in Milan | Daily Mail Online

author: Jabeen Waheed For Mailonline
title: Fergie wears over-sized shearling aviator jacket in Milan
text:
She rivalled the supermodels on the catwalk as she made a trendy arrival to the Moschino A/W 2017 runway show during Milan Fashion Week on Thursday.
And Fergie's sartorial display didn't end there as she ensured all focus on her while heading out in the picturesque Italian city the next day.
The 41-year-old Black Eyed Peas singer wrapped up in style in an over-sized dramatic shearling-lined aviator jacket over a figure-hugging ribbed khaki dress.
Scroll down for video
Wrapping up in style: Fergie, 41, wore over-sized dramatic shearling-lined aviator jacket over a figure-hugging ribbed khaki dress as she headed out in Milan
Fergie's dramatic outerwear featured an eye-catching turtleneck detail and was pulled together by a single button.
The songstress' attention-grabbing dress hugged the contours of her body before falling at a sexy thigh-skimming finish.
Looking every inch the diva, the American born beauty opted for a pair of knee-high black boots, which boasted slight lace-up detailing.
The Big Girls Don't Cry singer accessorised with a chic black handbag and black shades.
Statement: Fergie's dramatic outerwear featured an eye-catching turtleneck detail and was pulled together by single button
Eye-catching: The songstress' attention-grabbing dress hugged the contours of her body before falling at a sexy thigh-skimming finish
The day before Fergie strutted her stuff in a bondage-inspired khaki cardigan worn over a black mini dress at the star-studded Moschino presentation in Milan.
The designer's choice of a polo-neck dress under the jacket both highlighted its detail and added a sexy element, as the contrast between the dress and jacket style emphasised the bondage-inspired nature of the outer garment.
She looked sensational in the kinky ensemble which she teamed with dominatrix-style mid-length lace up boots.
The Grammy award-winning singer wore her bleach blonde hair in sexy tousled waves for the show.
Walk this way: Looking every inch the diva, the American born beauty opted for a pair of thigh-high black boots, which boasted slight lace-up detailing
Trendy lady: The Big Girls Don't Cry singer accessorised with a chic black handbag and black shades
All eyes on her: The day before Fergie strutted her stuff in a bondage-inspired khaki cardigan worn over a black mini dress at the star-studded Moschino A/W17 presentation in Milan
Fergalicious! The Grammy award-winning singer looked phenomenal in a khaki belted coat and wore her bleach blonde hair in sexy tousled waves for the show
Meanwhile, back in Los Angeles Fergie has been working on her own music and projects.
The mother-of-two took a leaf out of Kim Kardashian's book on Monday by sharing a close-up of her pert derriere on Instagram with two movie slateboard clapper emojis.
The singer was photographed from behind wearing a high-cut tight PVC body suit that showed off her rounded buttocks.
She had on thigh-high skintight wet-look leggings and high-heel ankle boots.
Cheeky: The mother-of-two took a leaf out of Kim Kardashian's book on Monday by sharing a close-up of her pert derriere on Instagram with two movie slateboard clapper emojis
